website_summaries.verdict: This plush microfiber option is beloved by thousands, offering an exceedingly soft pillowcase set at an affordable price.
pros: Strong materials built to withstand washing machines
cons: Some users wish the fabric was more breathable, as the pillowcases tend to feel hot throughout the night

customer_reviews.title: Caused immediate skin rash!
customer_reviews.text: As I was taking these out of the package they rubbed against my inner arm and immediately cause an awful skim rash - and I do not even have sensitive skin! Put them on pillows for all of 2 minutes and they irritated my face so badly I immediately packed them back into the box to return. Have never been so disappointed with an Amazon purchase that had had such high reviews. Do not recommend at ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: WRINKLES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Still wrinkles when I've tried many methods of wash and dry. I'm not going to press these everyday, I bought 48 of them...I use these for my Acupuncture clinic and the wrinkles make for an 'unkept' looking treatment room. Smooth and silky though! and cheap :( These keep getting more and more wrinkly! Terrible product
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Cimperman

customer_reviews.title: These turned out to be beautiful polyester pillowcases at a ridiculously low price
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be beautiful polyester pillowcases at a ridiculously low price! I have four king pillows on my bed and a lavender duvet. The pillowcases wash and dry with no wrinkles or dye loss, and dress up the bedroom really well. Highly recommended - I don't know how they can charge so little for such quality. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: john e. harron

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty color and soft as well!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. For a low price pillow case I’m VERY happy. I have all king size pillows and i like the extra long king size cases. These are great. They have a little extra material so your pillow isn’t hanging out of the end. They’re not see through, so they should hold up in the wash. I bought 12 more for my kids beds. For this price we can afford to have a bunch for backup on wash day!
customer_reviews.author: Cherries27

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I just received these pillowcases today. I am extremely disappointed in the total lack of quality in this product. I expected it to be somewhat wrinkly from shipment. However, after removing them from the packaging I noticed that they seemed scrunched.Upon turning the cases inside out I realized some of the seams almost appear to be basted. The seams were not straight. There were a lot of loose threads and the thread size was not consistent. It reminded me of my seventh grade home economics project. The material was very soft but there was a total lack of quality when it came to the manufacturing of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. Color is
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were 100% cotton instead were 100% polyester. very disappointed. Color is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pills and stitching comes out after 1 wash
customer_reviews.text: These are very basic and aren't well-made. I really love the color and wanted to love the pillowcases themselves just as much, but I can't recommend them. I've washed them once (and the sheet set), and they are shedding little pill balls all over, and the stitching is starting to unravel. Not worth your trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Genduso

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: Wide selection of colors to choose from. comfortable and soft. I haven't washed one yet so I ncan't comment on durability or color fade loss, but for the money who cares. Much better than plain white that get discolored. At least these may fade but won't look dirty out of the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Daiv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Pillowcases!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much that I bought two sets. The fit my plush, king size pillows perfectly. They wash like a dream & stay put on the pillows. To ensure wrinkle-free bedding, I always recommend to pull sheets/pillowcases straight from the dryer and onto the bed/pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Janean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and I love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these pillow cases. They are soft, but not like flannel if that’s what you are looking for, they are cool in the warmer days and warm in the cold days. I got the deep red and the navy blue (dark), they are beautiful colors. The only thing I would say though is that if you have very fluffy pillows don’t get the standard size, I would get the queen size. I’m saying that because I got the standard size and the ends of my pillow stick out a bit and the pillow case then starts to slide down. I still am happy with them and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pillowcases - with an oil stain
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the pillowcases are soft and wrinkle resistant, as described, but fabric is very thin. I still liked them, but I was disappointed when one of the pillowcases had about a 6 in oil stain. Would have added a pic if it were an option. I treated the stain and it was better, but still there. I'm just dealing with it since it's not worth a return of my whole order for one case. Getting what you paid for applies here.
customer_reviews.author: L Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Average softness. Nothing special. Size was chosen to fit queen pillows. They barely fit. These are only for standard pillows. To be fair, the package states standard, but the site said they would fit queen. Will look for a better size to fit the pillows better.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Soft Pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: These pillowcases are a perfect color and very soft and well made. I have used them and they wash well. Having so many of them is really helpful because I can use them in every room. They match my blue house. I say buy these in bulk you will not be sorry. It was shipped quickly and when I need these again i will look to find this seller. The price also was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Soft, quantity, good price
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of these. My household is full of pillow thieves. Having all the kids pillows in one color helps with the “confusion”. I don’t like sharing a pillow and now they can identify theirs. I bought the same ones in a totally different color for my pillows. I wash pillow cases more often than sheets due to Covid. It makes life easy when colors are assigned. I like that these come in small bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as vibrant as they seem!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very soft to the touch pretty decent quality but the red isn’t as bright and vibrant as the image looks and doesn’t really match my red bed sheets. It’s more of a maroon type of red. I’m kindof disappointed because I thought it would of matched perfectly the image sure did. I should have listened to the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Linda Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because we have these really really long pillows. Great fit - but the seams already are falling apart. Thank goodness I have a sewing machine and was able to patch the seams that are falling apart but they are not sturdy whatsoever. Easy to clean but really if you're looking for durability go elsewhere or make sure you know how to sew/have a sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a couple of sets of these pillow slips (in light grey and in sand) to go with the Ivy Union Premium Ultra-Soft Microfiber Sheet Sets that we already had. The colors matched the original pillow cases and sheets exactly, and they're extremely soft and comfortable. The fit is also great. I've purchased many other pillow cases that were slightly too narrow and the snug fit made the pillow feel so hard, but the width of these Bare Home pillow cases is perfect. I would highly recommend these pillow cases. We definitely intend to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: mtlgal

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: This looks like quite an expensive pillow, very well sewn. I like my feather pillows pretty soft, so I have to remove about 1/3 of the feathers so I can fluff it to my wishes. However, I am sure most people find it great as is. The cover is actually quilted, and no feathers poke through at all. Packaging was nice as well. It was boxed and would be easy to wrap and give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft and I'm happy with the purchase. I'd give them five stars if the pillow cases had the extra fold inside to encase the open end of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Haamundegg

customer_reviews.title: Stains!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets stain and they have false advertising! They are not Microfiber sheets compared to our other sheets. They have stains on them from oils that we use with other sheets that are microfiber and they don't do what these did in a month! They are super thin sheets too and 100% Polyester NOT Microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazzing

customer_reviews.title: Pillowcases were great, but seller is spamming via Amazon's contact form
customer_reviews.text: The pillowcases I received are great. However, the seller (and brand owner) has used Amazon's contact form to solicit positive feedback. That is not okay, and I cannot recommend any product from a seller who engages in this sort of behavior.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnat

customer_reviews.title: We loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. As you can see one of our dogs loves it. We got these for movie night in the tv room. Excellent value and quality. I would buy again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sean F

customer_reviews.title: softness and breathable
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets I have ordered several sets now- I love that they wash up nice and hold up nice as well. They are very soft and breathable- For the price you can not go wrong on these. I used to buy the expensive sheets thinking they were better because of the name brand and price- but half the time the sheets were stiff and left me sweating through out the night. I won't buy any other brand at this point- I gave 4 stars only because they are a little thin- hence the breathability.!!! Cant' go wrong on these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, beautiful quality.
customer_reviews.text: These pillowcases are soft, well-constructed and wrinkle-free. They match the sheets and my other pillowcases perfectly. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Barnes

customer_reviews.title: look close  before washing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an extra 4 pillow cases to go with the same sheet set I ordered a few days before . The sheet set "sage" color is darker that the "sage" color on the extra 4 Pk SAGE pillow case pack . same company ,same brand but not matching colors at all . not cool . I should of sent them back but did not realize it until after they were washed.
customer_reviews.author: t s

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Mystery Material
customer_reviews.text: This was the absolute worst product I've ever had the mispleasure of purchasing. The pillow cases felt like they were made out of fibreglass and shed very small scratchy fibres that completely ruined all my bedding. I threw these pillow cases out and washed my other bedding 3 times and there were still a large amount of these scratchy particles remaining from these pillow cases which forced me to toss out all of my bedding. HORRENDOUS product, can't possibly understand how these are rated so highly. Do yourself a favor and invest in some nice quality 100% cotton pillow cases and skip this Chinese mystery material.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow-Case Ever!
customer_reviews.text: We're delighted with these hypoallergenic microfiber pillow cases. They are soft, roomy enough for fluffy pillows, and are holding up well in gentle laundering. The colors are lovely and are holding well, I bought dark green. Thank you, I've finally found great pillow cases - and will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillowcases!
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft and I absolutely love them. Due to ptsd issues I have to create a sort of "nest" when I sleep. I bought some extra pillows for myself and I wanted some really soft pillowcases to help me be more comfortable and these worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kyla McFadden-Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Washed the pillow cases one time to put on my bed and they have snagged and loose strings. Very disappointed in these
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: great but no color matching sheets...
customer_reviews.text: i love these pillow cases. they r soft and very comfortable. the ONLY reason i gave 3 stars... the pillow case and fitted sheet, of the same brand, same listed color of PLUM, do not match! see photo. i can live with it tho. also if u buy a fitted sheet from this company, plz know they r not tight fitting sheets. again, see photo. i still would recommend this brand. its very soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: b. monroe

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: They washed nicely and didn’t wrinkle. I bought them to use standard pillows on our king size bed and they wash better than the sheet set I bought them for. They are closer to white, but they still work nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem more expensive than pillow cases that I had been buying for years. Definitely softer. One thing that I am unsure of, the instructions say to wash in cold water. I wash them in the same water and dry them the same way, permanent press, as I do the other pillow cases. So far, no problem
customer_reviews.author: D. Zalkind

customer_reviews.title: Great pillowcases.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, silky smooth, and very comfortable to sleep on. They also dry fast after pulling them from the washer, though I always just stick them into the dryer anyways. But that is a plus if you still air dry your laundry. They've been pretty sturdy so far as well. My washing machine chewed up my old pillowcases that I got from JC Penney's, but these haven't so much as frayed yet. I'll definitely order more as my older pillowcases wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D Painter

customer_reviews.title: some flaws
customer_reviews.text: I hate to complain because these are really cheap, the fitted sheet is too big has a flaw in the knit. Not really a big issue! BUT worst of all it has some spots. Looks like oil. Did not come out with normal laundering. The rest of the set is decent and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Outthere234

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pillow cases.
customer_reviews.text: The color is great. They wash and dry perfectly. No color loss and wrinkle free from the dryer. Feel soft and look great on the bed. Being used in the guest bedroom. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: goldfish99887

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I usually go for more expensive sheets but when we bought a king sized bed I thought I would try these. They were highly rated and fairly inexpensive. LOVE them. They are really soft and light weight. They wash up very well. In fact, I just bought a second set. No need to spend $100 on a set of sheets. These are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Care
customer_reviews.text: These pillowcases are a second set to my original sheet set purchase. They are soft and very easy to take care of. If you don't get them out of the dryer immediately, no problem. Just give them a slight warm up and no wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality.  Color also was off.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality. Color also was off. These are nowhere as soft as others we have ordered. Also the color was off. We ordered a light brownish color, but these are almost white.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the place to go to get hard to find items.
customer_reviews.text: These came clean and wrinkle free. They're as soft as fine cotton and cool to sleep on. The stitching on the hem is good. The color was true to the picture and they seem durable but I won't know until I've had them for awhile. Beats driving to multiple stores to find them!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i like all bare home products, soft and comfortable for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching will not last.
customer_reviews.text: Only held together with one row of stitching...returned after 4-5 washes falling apart, Walmart has better quality. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like you're sleeping on a cheap motel pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 4 pack pillow cases. After taking them out of the package I noticed they were very rough to the touch. I tried them for a few minutes and the fabric was so rough it scratched my face. It is advertised as 1800 ultasoft, but the fabric is more like a fabric softener sheet. It feels like a cheap motel pillowcase. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: John Vicinanza

customer_reviews.title: Get one for you and as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my toddler and need some for myself. They are so soft and seem to stay relatively cool to the touch. Color was as expected and they've held up well to toddler abuse and washing.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I lost sleep because of these
customer_reviews.text: These are very scratchy, I don't know how, but they had my face rubbed raw after less than one night of sleep. It actually took a while to figure out that it was the roughness causing the problem instead of an allergic reaction
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly the color I was expecting. I ordered the grey and they are a rich deep grey. So soft and light weight. Will order an extra set.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina R.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pillow cases in bulk to switch out all of the cases for my family. We have dust mite allergies and wanted to be able to frequently wash our cases. What a bonus that they’ve turned out to be soft and comfortable! Each of my children and my husband have commented on how much they like them! Another bonus in buying white cases, is that there is no threat of damaging them with acne medicine my teens use. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Meg Beltran

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are really wrinkle free. I mean maybe a small wrinkle here or there but the last “wrinkle free” covers I tried looked like a crumbled up paper bag out of the dryer. These are good.
customer_reviews.author: johng

customer_reviews.title: Love the Colors
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats that sleep on my pillow and my husband is allergic- these are great and have improved the amount of hair and dander he's dealing with, not to mention they come in great colors!
customer_reviews.author: N. Geuther

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to go with a new bedding set I purchased. I was concerned that it would be a different shade than the bedding. It matches perfectly! Couldn’t be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda Phelps

customer_reviews.title: I bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great feeling pillow case but it just was too narrow for my overstuffed pillow. It was difficult to get my down pillow into the pillow case and then when I put my head on it, the down pillow was restricted and could not relax to accommodate my head sufficiently. It seems that this pillow case is 20in wide and I ended up buying an oversized pillowcase which worked out much better. If you have a standard sized pillow then this would be a great pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Santandrea

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets I’ve owned for comfort and keeping cool at night
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly soft and comfortable sheets at a great price. They are the best sheets I’ve owned, and I bought a second set. Highlights include easy to clean, durable, extremely soft, breathable and don’t hold heat, and really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable product in cool months
customer_reviews.text: The pillow cases are well made and represent well the advertisement. However the fabric is polyester not cotton which might not be comfortable in the summer months. We have not laundered product yet to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Shine

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good value choice when the hypoallergenic aspect matters.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Bop

customer_reviews.title: super soft
customer_reviews.text: matches color of the sheets we purchased from same company. very comfortable and the size is perfect for king pillows
customer_reviews.author: Coppychoppy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were a great price and with all the good reviews I decided to take a chance. I'm so glad I did. These sheets are amazingly soft and feel fantastic. They are a bit on the thin side but the softness makes up for it. They fit my California king, 14" deep mattress with room to spare. I give them 4.8 stars, taking off .1 for being thin and .1 for not being a snug fit. I hope they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these and anything for this company amazing sheets and pillow cases!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than normal
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even notice it says "kids", but then again, why would I because "kids" isn't a pillow size. They are too short for a standard/queen pillow. I haven't posted a picture, but just imagine your pillow... then imagine about 2 inches of it sticking out the end.
customer_reviews.author: MoCa425

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: We love our pillow cases! They are nice and soft and just what I wanted. Word of caution they are SUPER white, so if you don't like that kind of white, might want to try something elsewhere....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish you carried a standard/queen size.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pillow cases however the standard was just a little bit short with the pillows are use, but the king would’ve been way too long. I wish you had this in a standard/queen size, that would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carla E.

customer_reviews.title: These are very cheaply made and ripped
customer_reviews.text: This ripped along the seam after the third wash. I am quite disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: PLB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sheets
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in Twin XL in hopes that this would really be deep pockets. It was not deep enough for our beds. So I gave them to my dad who has a Twin XL mattress, just not as deep as ours and they fit perfectly for his bed. They are very soft and the color green is gorgeous. He is 88 years old, grumpy and hard to please. He really likes them! I love how fast they dry in the dryer! He has two sets now in the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Super

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have set of the sheets, however, this time I gave it as a gift to my Aunt who was visiting. She opened it but didn't remove it from the package. When she got home and removed from the packaging in order to wash before putting them on the bed, one of the pillowcases had a slit in the material. It's to much of a hassle to get it back from her and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first set and tried them out. Wow We then bought another set for our split king. They don’t come off and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Soft, wash well.
customer_reviews.text: These are really soft and durable. They are on the lighter side, so not too warm. My dog did put a tear in them with her claw so, but she has done that with higher end brands too. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: DJDubs

customer_reviews.title: SHEETS THAT STAY ON YOUR BED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets!!!!!!!! I.have been in a war with my sheets, they kept pulling off when I raised the head of the bed. No more, these stay on great and they are winkle free for the most part- if I don't leave them in the dryer too long that is.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia H.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow case. It fits a standard size pillow, the color is right, and it is comfortable and machine washable. It's everything you could want for a pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable sheets
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are very well made, extra soft. Twin XL sheets were a little too big, but very comfortable. Pillows are top sheet (King) were also good-- It would be nice if Bare Home made the split King bed sets-But would difinitely buy thee again-price was great
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Hermann

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for us, and liked these sheets so well that I bought a set for my sister-in-law. By accident I discovered that "twin XL" will fit on a full-sized mattress....
customer_reviews.author: Pamlet

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap and inconsistent stitching. Spots on pillowcases along with some of the threading is actually pull out around one of them. Will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Liddy

customer_reviews.title: I love the sheets except for the plum colors not matching up
customer_reviews.text: Bought a plum sheet set with an extra pillow case set. Between the 2 the plum colors did not match and had a completely different shade. I was fully refund and it was quick with great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Foppe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are okay for the amount of product you get at the price listed. The fabric, though soft, is on the thin side and the seam is sewed on slightly wonky. But hey, they survived the wash and appear to be holding up. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are a delight. For years I’ve spent considerable money on 1,000 thread count bed linens. These are easily as nice, cool and comfortable. An added bonus is customer service is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Greich

customer_reviews.title: So soft and fits right in
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pillow case with the new pillow I was eyeing on for awhile. This is absolutely silky smooth and I love how it feels on my face. I am a side sleeper, and I would recommend this pillow case to anyone looking for a nice, smooth ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sang Jin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: When you wash them the thread shrinks and the pucker all along the stitching. So if you don’t mind that wrinkly look the fabric is soft. I can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Quality but thin
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be pretty high-quality considering their bedspread is the best I've ever had for the money but very thin material very soft but yeah very thin otherwise would have given five stars a little bit small also
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for guest bedroom and they get the job done! They are soft and feel nice on the skin. I do think the material probably retains heat and wouldn't stay cool if that is an issue for you. But for the price, you could definitely do a lot worse! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't go wrong...
customer_reviews.text: These are great when you have more pillows that pillowcases to match your sheets. I primarily use in guest bedrooms. A great value, they do not pill, good standard sizing, I got the navy blue and no issue with color.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ready for the holidays with red & white in my bed room.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, very difficult to find individual pillow cases not in a set Thanks
customer_reviews.author: bill irwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice color sage
customer_reviews.text: The sage Color is very pretty. It looks good even after a few hot washes so it’s a good product. .
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Swezy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality/poor sticking.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited that I purchased a good quality, Stitching coming off, poor quality, I’m afraid to even touch it because seems like the seam will open up completely. will return, waste of time and money, not happy
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these will continue to buy these again if needed very comfortable and I fall asleep right away. I bought these for my kids and ourselves as well.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER L BOWMAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice material
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these pillowcases. Nice color very soft. I would purchase other colors of the same pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Good pillowcases for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. We purchased to replace old pillowcases. They do the job and are well priced. They are soft and wrinkle free as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Danny L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better price
customer_reviews.text: Was really skeptical about these pillow cases because of the inexpensive price. But they are some of the best I've ever bought. I am definitely going to order a set of sheets now that I know how great the product is.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Thren

customer_reviews.title: pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these on my pillows. Not scratchy and doesn't wrinkle. They are a little snug which I like. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color, but very soft
customer_reviews.text: I ordered gray and unfortunately these are a sandy tan.
customer_reviews.author: Jared lyons

customer_reviews.title: Soft pillowcases.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how well these pillowcases will stand the test of time, but as of today they feel soft, fit well (king pillows), and seem sturdy. I appreciate the fact that there are shades of color to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: No shrink and no wrinkle pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the pillowcases, was better than I expected. I have washed them several times and no shrinkage at all and not one wrinkle. I will definitely order from the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl L. Creighton

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: these sheets were bought in a pinch, I was looking for something quick and cheap since our old sheet set came out of the wash with a hole. These showed up and were scratchy and not comfortable. Color is good, vibrant but not worth it. I immediately order some from cosy house and they are SO much better. I would not buy these again
customer_reviews.author: CleFireGuy

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresents size
customer_reviews.text: Twice I tried to get red standard sized pillowcases and twice the package contained huge, oversized king pillow cases despite the package stating they were "standard" cases. The white pillowcase package had standard sizes. Someone needs to check the red packages!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bashaw

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Will continue to buy these they are comfortable and I fall alseep right away. Easy to wash and love that they come in different colors
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER L BOWMAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cases
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pillow cases in black to use on pillows in my black recliner to fit on and for my back. Wrinkles smooth out nicely and they aren't so noticeable in the chair. Would recommend for sleeping as well. ☺
customer_reviews.author: schnorkiemom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I'll be back for more asap. They launder really well, are really comfortable, and I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Micofiber is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The material is comfortable, the color is grey-black to black, I wouldn't call the color 'shiny', but it's not exactly matte either. It's something in between. If you were hoping for a more solid matte look, this will have a bit of shine to it. If you're looking for something shinier go with silk pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow cases at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these pillow cases to match a new quilt I bought. The color was spot on and they’re very soft. I washed them as soon as I got them and they laundered well, and didn’t wrinkle either. Would recommend these to anyone looking for pillow cases that are large enough too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Soft, and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So soft! A little hard to put on new pillows but they look great and feel awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Colors from different shipments didn't match.
customer_reviews.text: ** update: the Bare Home reps took my review of the colors mis-match in stride. These are still really nice sheets!** I purchased the standard pillow cases to accompany the Split King sheet set that already had 2 king pillow cases. Both were labeled “plum” colored. However, they are not quite the same color. The sheets are soft and feel like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Stocks

customer_reviews.title: Fit’s perfectly with standard size pillows
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and feel great! I’m very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: NikoZ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I washed the pillow cases, as recommended, before use. I should have examined more closely before as I found a whole in one of the cases. Basically very poorly crafted. Since they have already been washed, I guess I'm stuck. Don't recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Renee'  Stone

product_meta.title: Bare Home Premium 1800 Ultra-Soft Kids Microfiber Pillowcase Set - Double Brushed - Hypoallergenic - Wrinkle Resistant (Standard Pillowcase Set of 2, Aqua)
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM COMFORT: 2 Standard Size Pillowcases (20" x 30")

HOTEL LUXURY FEEL THE DIFFERENCE: Spoil yourself with our Luxury 1800 premium ultra-soft microfiber fabric is woven with the finest craftsmanship. Exquisitely designed with a perfect combination of durability and softness that will have you sleeping comfortably every night for years to come! With superior breathability they will keep you warm and cozy in the winter and cool in the summer.

PREMIUM QUALITY & HYPOALLERGENIC: Breathable, hypoallergenic, and double brushed microfiber yarns provide resistance from dust mites and other allergens, great for those prone to allergies or asthma! Treat yourself right with our Luxury 1800 Microfiber Collection. You will be waking up feeling rested and refreshed every morning. Our linens are wrinkle, shrink, fade, and stain resistant!

EASY CARE & WRINKLE RESISTANT: Machine washable, dries quickly on tumble dry low. The ultra-soft double brushed microfiber yarns surpasses the traditional softness of Egyptian cotton. Our wrinkle resistant sheets give you that fresh, new look every time you put them on your bed. No ironing required!
